function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases in crowded cities due to interactions in social and professional settings.","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases leading to higher infection rates and overwhelmed healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and public health awareness campaigns.","Technologies":"Sanitization equipment, contactless payment systems, and public health tracking and monitoring tools.","People":"People traveling into cities for work, interacting socially and professionally, panic buyers in supermarkets, and communities of color facing stigmatization.","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, private businesses, and individuals."}]}
